content.text:
# New Features

The Eliza project has added several new plugins and integrations:
- Hyperliquid plugin (#2141)
- DeepSeek AI provider support (#2067)
- Mistral AI as a new model provider (#2137)
- Text-to-Speech with support for over 15 languages (#2110)
- Primus zkTLS plugin for verifying agent activities (#2086)
- Quai integration (#2083)
- Asterai plugin (#2045)
- Massa plugin (#1582)
- NFT plugin (#2167)
- Cloudflare AI Gateway support (#821)

Additional feature enhancements include:
- GitHub added to client enumerations (#2157)
- Image descriptions functionality (#1775)
- More lenient Solana transaction handling (#2053)
- External router path and new tweet generation capabilities (#2081)
- File upload security implementation (#1806)

# Bug Fixes

Several bugs have been addressed in recent updates:
- Fixed Discord join voice action (#2160)
- Corrected SUI/USD price calculation (#2150)
- Fixed lens export name and duplicate imports (#2142)
- Supabase updates and fixes (#2100)
- Fixed Starknet plugin by replacing walletProvider with portfolio provider (#2029)
- Removed root requirement for installation (#2221)
- Fixed Twitter plugin prompt to ensure JSON returns (#2196)
- Fixed PostgreSQL adapter migration extension creation (#2188)
- Fixed missing LETZAI model (#2187)
- Fixed DeepSeek API bug with missing API key setting (#2186)
- Cleaned up Twitter mention deduplication (#2185)
- Fixed release 0.1.8 issues (#2184)
- Fixed DeepSeek support in getTokenForProvider (#2179)
- Fixed missing langdetect on plugin-tts package.json (#2175)
- Replaced invalid Together AI medium model (#2173)
- Fixed RAG knowledge for PostgreSQL (#2153)
- Fixed chat infinite loop issue (#1755)

# Documentation and Testing

Improvements to documentation and testing include:
- Added tests for Coinbase plugin (#2170)
- Moved UUID tests to correct __tests__ directory (#2168)
- Added Portuguese version of README (#2088)
- Added Greek translation for README (#2199)
- Added Persian README file (#2182)
- Added tests for WhatsApp plugin (#2213)
- Updated git command for checking latest release (#1705)
- Added UUID tests and fixed version 5 bits (#1362)

# Other Changes

Other notable changes include:
- Renamed ai16z to elizaOS (#2211)
- Prepared for version 0.1.8.build.1 (#2194, #2193)
- Optimized memory fetching by moving sorting and slicing to DB (#2135)
- Added inheritance of character from parent using extends key (#2159)
- Added conditionals for Supabase to agent directory (#2032)
- Added mention deduplication utility for Twitter client (#2178)
- Set file nesting for md and DockerFile in VSCode (#2177)
- Performed linting and fixes on develop branch (#2180)

categories.title: Recent Issues in ElizaOS GitHub Repository

content.text:
Several technical issues have been reported in the ElizaOS GitHub repository:

1. Type incompatibility between 'url' and 'request' parameters in fresh clones (Issue #2164)

2. Login authentication failures with error code 399 (Issue #2155)

3. Duplicate replies to TWITTER_TARGET_USER when ElizaOS restarts (Issue #2161)

4. Need for additional tests in the Coinbase plugin to align with package structure (Issue #2169)

5. Database connection errors when using the image generation plugin (Issue #2158)

Several installation and dependency issues have also been reported:

1. pnpm installation and startup errors (Issue #2203)

2. Docker image build failures (Issue #2192)

3. Lock file errors and missing dependencies (Issue #2183)

4. Outdated lockfile errors with pnpm (Issue #2215)

Additionally, there's a feature request for RAG/Knowledge support for Twitter Spaces characters (Issue #2202).

Current cryptocurrency prices:

WETH: The price has increased from $3,267.18 to $3,282.39, showing a slight upward movement.

SOL: The price has risen marginally from $187.66 to $187.96.

WBTC: The price has decreased from $94,611.67 to $94,392.52, showing a slight downward trend.

ai16z: The price has significantly decreased from $1.39 to $1.16, representing a notable drop of approximately 17%.

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text: The elizaOS/eliza repository has seen several significant pull requests recently, focusing on new features and version updates. PR #2171 prepares for the release of version 0.1.8, moving code from the development branch to the main branch. This indicates ongoing development and a new stable release coming soon.

Several PRs are focused on NFT functionality. PR #2163 introduces NFT PRO features, while PR #2167 adds an NFT plugin. PR #2189 expands NFT capabilities with functions for retrieving owned NFTs, creating listings, and getting floor listings. These additions suggest a strong focus on blockchain and NFT integration within the Eliza platform.

Other notable contributions include PR #2162, which adds a chainbase plugin for Eliza, further enhancing blockchain capabilities, and PR #1184, which integrates 'o1' functionality. PR #2217 adds a new character named Nayari to the system, expanding the platform's character roster.

The elizaos/eliza repository showed significant activity over a two-day period. From January 11-12, 2025, there were 23 new pull requests with 27 merged, 7 new issues created, and 65 active contributors. The following day (January 12-13, 2025) saw increased PR activity with 30 new pull requests and 26 merged, along with a substantial rise in new issues (19), while active contributors slightly decreased to 61.

The provided sources mention 'Top contributors for elizaOS/eliza' but do not provide any specific details about who these contributors are or their contributions to the project. Without additional information, it's not possible to generate a detailed summary about the individual contributors, their roles, or the nature of their contributions to the elizaOS/eliza project.
